content.description: Sit start with hands matched on opposing sidepulls at the bottom of the vertical worm feature. From there, reach left hand sidepull, then a right hand sidepull, match the left on the opposing sidepull, gain the sloping shelfs above, use a two-finger pocket as intermediate before the lip, and mantle on top the boulder.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work perfectly. The landing is flat and even.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Boudoir.

content.description: Crouch start with a hands matched on the flat jug on the arete. From there, work up the hueco, place a right heel hook, reach a left hand edge, follow with the right hand to an intermediate bump and then the lip, and mantle atop for the send.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing is flat and even, perfect.
content.location: It climbs the southwest arete of Boudoir.
